face2face.statistics.null_modell.mapping_function¶

face2face.statistics.null_modell.mapping_function(Data, label='type')¶

Creates a mapping

Creates a mapping dict to create the attribute mixing matrix dynamic independent of the amount of attributes

Parameters

  • Data (Data) – Data Object that contains Tij- and Metadata for a dataset.

  • label (str) – A string that tells the function which attribute should be mapped.

Returns

mapping – A dictionary that contains the dimensions of the given attribute.

Return type

dict

Examples

Based on the amount of attribute values the used attribute has, you have to create a mapping for the null model functions. >>> mapping = mapping_function(test_df, label=”Age”) >>> print(mapping) {0: 0, 1: 1, 2: 2} >>> mapping = mapping_function(test_df, label=”Sex”) >>> print(mapping) {0: 0, 1: 1}

See also

face2face.statistics.null_modell.configuration_model_label_z_score_mixing_matrix(), face2face.statistics.null_modell.shuffle_label_z_score_mixing_matrix()
